net.mtrop.doom.WadBuffer

Packages that use WadBuffer 
Package Description
net.mtrop.doom
Contains the base structural abstracts for this library.
net.mtrop.doom.util
Contains utility classes.

  • Uses of WadBuffer in net.mtrop.doom

    Methods in net.mtrop.doom that return WadBuffer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static WadBuffer WadBuffer.extract​(Wad source, int startIndex, int maxLength)
    Creates a new WadBuffer from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.
    static WadBuffer WadBuffer.extract​(Wad source, WadEntry... entries)
    Creates a new WadBuffer from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.
    WadBuffer DoomPK3.getDataAsWadBuffer​(String entryName)
    Retrieves the data for a particular entry, presuming it to be a WAD of some kind, and returns it as a fully read WadBuffer.

  • Uses of WadBuffer in net.mtrop.doom.util

    static WadBuffer WadUtils.openWadAndExtractBuffer​(File path, WadUtils.WadFunction<WadEntry[]> wadFunction)
    Opens a WAD file, exports a list of entries to a new returned WadBuffer, and then closes it automatically afterward.

    Opens a WAD file, exports a list of entries to a new returned WadBuffer, and then closes it automatically afterward.
